nodes.text: This form of body armor was used by the Rebel Alliance,especially between the Battle of Yavin and the Battle of Hoth. The design of the helmet was similar to that of clone trooper armor, the clone paratrooper variant in particular.

It was used by Able and his troops when they boarded and hijacked an Imperial cargo ship. When they rescued Janek Sunber from an Imperial space station, Luke Skywalker and Deena Shan wore this armor, though without the helmets.

In Star Wars Galaxies, this armor is named Rebel SpecForce Armor and it can be obtained by purchasing it with PvP Battlefield Tokens from Staff Sergeant Levardio at the Rebel Outpost on Rori. A battle-worn version that is wearable by non-humans can be purchased from Rebel recruiters with Galactic Civil War Tokens.
